text: <@U02F8LF2X>: Thanks for putting this together. I closed up on Friday night (in a rush) so might have missed a few things in the process.

To respond to your points: 1. We typically wouldn't hold an event on a Friday night. This was an exception where Robbie is a friend and we wanted to help her out. That said, I'm not sure what the cleaning crew can do about changing shifts ( <@U027PV4AP> ?) Should we have an event on a Saturday night (which would also be rare) it's probably best to keep it to Sunday. 2.  I completely misunderstood the sign and left the overhead light on. Won't happen again. 3 & 4: I was not around during setup, so not sure how those were unplugged. (<@U026NB2U2> <@U027PV4AP> ?) 5. Wholly agree on this. This also might help with the smell of empties if we delegate alcohol containers to the sealed black trashcan or something.

One additional thing: 6. we should probably put together some sort of "cleanup/post event" checklist. I always feel like I'm forgetting something when I head out (and I usually am). As more and more of us start hosting the events, i think it would be helpful.
cool, I like the sealed bin idea and the checklist.
